channel.title: (HELP)Chars reset? & walking after lighting a fire or agility?(HELP)
channel.description:
alrighty so i have 2 problems
First is somthings wrong with my char files sometimes game is just fine... but then someone will log off for a half hour to an hour... then their accs get reset... any help?
Now the second is i was just woundering about walking after lighting a fire... ive played withit alot just nothing worked... does anybody have a working somthing lol that will make you walk after lighting a fire.. i know where to add it i just dont know how to make it.. please help me :D
